text: My Sister Eileen is a 1955 American musical comedy movie directed by Richard Quine and based on the autobiographical short stories by Ruth McKenney. It stars Janet Leigh, Jack Lemmon, Betty Garrett, Bob Fosse, Dick York, Adelle August and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1955 comedy movies Category:1955 musical movies Category:American musical comedy movies Category:Movies based on short stories Category:Movies directed by Richard Quine Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: My Sister Eileen
